Server - package Server
package Server
Server - Class in Server
The Server class listens for incoming client connections on a specific port and manages communication with connected clients.
Server() - Constructor for class Server.Server
Constructor for the Server class.
Server.globalConn - Class in Server
The globalConn class contains the database connection parameters required to connect to the database.
